website_summaries.verdict: This biometric safe has a superior fingerprint sensor that is certified by the F.B.I. and proves reliable.
pros: Uses a 3-D imaging system for better biometric detection than other models
Holds up to 40 unique fingerprints for biometric ID
Door automatically locks when it is closed
Has a light on the interior of the safe
cons: Not a fireproof safe and does not include a backup pin pad for alternative access

website_summaries.verdict: High quality sensor with 3D silicon sensor on a solid safe.
pros: Easy to add and delete users
Alerts you to unauthorized attempts to enter
Has a longer battery life than others on the market
Alerts you when batteries are getting low
Does an excellent job opening reliably
Good customer service from the company
cons: This safe may take a little longer to get into than other models

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break into
customer_reviews.text: This device has the same weak lock I exposed on a Stanley-brand safe and an Ivation-brand safe. People need to know that the tools for opening these locks are available for cheap on Amazon, and that using these tools requires no skill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe is great!  UPS can't deliver!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these several months ago and loved it. We decided to buy another. The next time we ordered one, it showed up bent and would not close correctly. We returned that one and ordered another. The next one showed up dented in the corner (see picture). We decided to keep it since it is the back corner and will be secured to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: FBI-approved biometric doesn't work easily every-time
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work as well as advertised ... if firearm is needed in a hurry, FBI-approved biometric doesn't work easily every-time
customer_reviews.author: Sourdoe Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good batteries I installed failed, cheapo ones they gave worked
customer_reviews.text: After installing the batteries the screen flickers. It turns out the good batteries I installed did not work, but the cheapo ones they sent worked OK. I was able to register 3 fingers after the initial issues. So far it seems OK. Also if you plan on mounting this to the wall or on the bottom, make sure you have a ratchet tool that can handle #10. The screws provided are not flat head or phillips head.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moss

customer_reviews.title: 92%  Battery after a year and a half!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this safe a year and a half now and could not be happier. Every single morning I open my safe to retrieve my pistol and every single evening I open it to put my pistol away. That's over 1000 openings so far. I haven't had a single false reading yet and the battery is still at 92%! I also love that it tells me when there's been an attempted entry to help notify if one of my kids curiosity might get the better of them. If I am ever in the market for another safe of this size I wouldn't look anywhere else. I wish they made a small pistol safe too!
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: We gave users names and it was very easy. I am very happy that the manufacturer of ...
customer_reviews.text: I just set it up after bolting it to a 2" oak plate at the top on a very heavy credenza. I used 1/16" neoprene rubber edge trim on the two lateral egdes, and graded washers over the oak at the bottom with safety coded unique bolts (think Torx with a twist). We gave users names and it was very easy. I am very happy that the manufacturer of this safe is a biometrics company, the fingerprint never fails. This does not mean mechanical details have been neglected either. The mechanical key is four sided, like at the bank vault. We are getting a second one for documents.
customer_reviews.author: EV4Life

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick access!
customer_reviews.text: Great sercurity box and well made. The finger print scanner works great as long as you place your finger on the reader the same way you set it up initially. Works every time. I keep a few pistols in there for home sercurty and I can have them in my hand within a few seconds if needed. If you want something you can access quickly with a fool proof reader and locking system this is it. The only down side is you really have to mount it to a surface with the hardware provided or someone could walk off with it. A little pricy but all in all a great product. I highly recommend this safe.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Opens when it shouldn't
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and returned it. My husband programmed his fingerprints and code. At first worked. Then it opened when he used fingers he didn't program in. He did this all before I arrived home. I tried my fingerprint, and it opened! Never programmed my fingerprints in. Very unsafe. UPDATE 9.28.17: My husband and I worked with the company and they replaced the product. They were legitimately concerned for its safety and I am revising my review to reflect that. The safe we have now works perfectly. They were the epitome of great customer service-a rarity nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Set Up was a Breeze, works like a charm. Only downside? Metal is pretty weak on ALL sides. Top, Bottom, Sides. Usually only the back of a good safe is weak. No WAY this thing is Fire PROOF, or Fire RESISTANT. Except door. 1/8" thick AT BEST! Probably closer to 1/16... Like a tin can with a bullet-proof door. STILL? If you can camouflage it with a box or something? Great! AND it for SURE keeps your kids safe from handguns!! I still recommend highly, in spite of flimsy construction. It seems that the whole $329 price tag is in the door and its features.
customer_reviews.author: JWurgler

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a second.
customer_reviews.text: Finger sensor stop working. Reset and still doesn't work. Can't even use the key.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Can’t read display when placed high in closet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe. The finger scanner works well and the box is strong and simple. One thing I dont like is if mounting at eye level or higher makes the LCD display useless unless you stand on something. The display is angled too much and I think there should be an option for the flat display that is on the top opening models.
customer_reviews.author: J mercer

customer_reviews.title: A great safe, perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for my needs.. The fingerprint mechanism is quite sensitive, which is fine by me. You simply need dry, clean fingers. Had it for about 6 months, had no problems, and as performed great. I like some of the specific features of this safe...if someone tries to get in, you will be alerted.The battery life is displayed so you are aware well in time to change. You can of course, bolt this to the floor a wall, though we haven't done so yet. I probably could have gone with the smaller size, but am ultimately glad I didn't. Ultimately, paying a little more, has given me a good piece of mind with this safe fire documents, firearms, or jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyBooks

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Shipping wedges in door tear off. No handle to open door.
customer_reviews.text: Important unpacking instructions. Pull door tape and remove spacer. Spacers are cheap plastic and on my safe they were wedged in so tightly, they tore off below the surface. The door comes unlocked, all you have to do is pull the spacers and the door pops open? Well, mine won’t open, and the brilliant designers of this safe did not put any method to pull open the door. It has no handle of any sort. It had great reviews, but my safe must have been on the low tolerance side where the packing crew has to jam the shipping wedge in the door. This will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Hoff J

customer_reviews.title: Good value well made easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The biometric reader works really well. My wife always has trouble with fingerprint readers but I set her up with no problems and it has worked every time she tried it. The setup instructions are easy to follow and there is a lot of flexibility and features. My guess is the supplied batteries are not the best but their lifespan remains to be seen. The safe itself is well made, seems plenty heavy duty enough for typical home use. The door is very heavy. There is quite a bit of usable inside space. It opens fast and quietly. Pricey but worth it. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is easy to use and programming my fingerprints was a breeze. Recognizes my fingerprint with out any hesitation or issues. Larger than I expected..I could easily fit five Smith and Wesson MP Shield 9mms in the modular holder in this safe. But I bought the three slot modular instead. Leaving room for other things. Only con I could find..Predrilled mounting holes on the bottom side of this safe would prevent it from being fire or waterproof...but that's not what I bought this for. I am completely happy and satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Parkecy

customer_reviews.title: A Company that cares about their customers
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these fingerprint safes and they are excellent. I had an issue with one of them not wanting to power on properly due to a finicky firmware. I contacted the company and spoke to Heather. Very professional and a pleasure to work with. She took care of patiently walking me through an upgrade process. Thank you for a great product and a wonderful customer service experience.
customer_reviews.author: SRTESQ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was certainly more than I wanted to spend for a safe next to the bed, but all the research showed it was the most reliable fingerprint reader. After a lot of opening and closing it's been fantastic, working every time, without having to redo the scan. It's expensive and it's not small either, as it will not fit in a normal drawer or even my bedside table shelf. That said, the security and reliability of the reader made it worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: TRG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The metal is thin and I hate the fact that there are hole in the back. So anyone can see or damage whats inside without even opening it. For the lock itself is awesome very high tech stuff. But there really should be a false wall in the rear seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good but too short.
customer_reviews.text: Technology works great. It’s worked 100% for me. Complaints you may read about the door not popping open upon unlock are valid but really a non-issue. It’s easy to open. My main complaint is that it’s not quite tall enough. A full frame automatic will not fit straight in height wise. So even the smallest 3 gun rack doesn’t easily accommodate full frame guns. The safe needs to be 2 inches taller really.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Everything promised and more.  Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.text: Best ever! I’m never buying any other brand again. Everything was exactly as described and it’s been flawless. I waited to provide a review until I used it for 6 months. It showed someone tried to access while I was out of town- which I found out was my son. (By asking). He was surprised I asked- and didn’t know it would show.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisk

customer_reviews.title: Buy Once - Cry Once
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the above average price scare you into buying something cheaper. This is the best safe on the market for your home defense needs; that provides the highest level of security from unauthorized access (children). I sleep well at night knowing that I can protect my children from intruders, and most of all themselves. The feature I like most about this safe is not only will it fail to open during an unauthorized attempt; it will also notify me that an unauthorized attempt was made. Do yourself and your family justice and don't take the cheap way out with safely securing your home defense firearms & buy once - cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Safe
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy setup. I was able to set up 3 fingerprints easily and they work every time. Love that it has a log that you can tell if someone else has tried to enter the safe. Many different setting for lights inside and on display. Mounting screws very secure. Sturdy metal casing and would be difficult to break into. Lined with felt so items do not scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Jokes

customer_reviews.title: Great safe!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this safe, I've had no issues. The only thing I didn't like is that the safe door is not flush with the rest of the safe, so you can "jiggle" the door back and forth a bit. I may put some rubber or something between the door and the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safe. The fingerprint sensor is accurate and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent safe. The fingerprint sensor is accurate and the safe opens and locks really fast. The door when locked isn't rigid so when you touch it it moves a little bit (nothing to worry about for the type of safe). The lock has solid bars and the space between the body and the door is very small so its doesn't seem like it would be easy to pry open. I'm very pleased and love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Progressing

customer_reviews.title: Damaged out of box
customer_reviews.text: Both bottom most corners are dented inwards. Box it came in was fine. Haven’t even tried it to see if it works. I’m just mad this was rated as top safe of 2018 and it’s not even fire rated.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Best Safe and Customer Service Bar None.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone looking for a true tamper proof safe, This is the one, well worth the price. Customer Service is Outstanding. I had an issue with shipping which resulted in minor damage. Called Customer Service and they had a new safe sent overnight without question. Quality and Service like this is rare indeed in today’s world. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Clemsonman80

customer_reviews.title: Not made with precision**updated
customer_reviews.text: There are dents on the surface and the metal panels are wrapped, leaving the rear side of bottom about 1/4 in off the ground. ==================== update: I made contact with verifi and they sent me a replacement pretty fast. Good service.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: An excellent safe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I bought (for my wife). The first one I bought in 2016 and has been working flawlessly. The finger print scanner is excellent and rarely, if ever, does it ask for a retry. It is well built with some heft, and keeps logs of who accessed the safe and when. It also keeps track of invalid attempts. They improved the current model by building in extra metal around the two door locking rods. For the price, this is an excellent biometric safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Semak

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good...
customer_reviews.text: The finger print recognition technology on this safe is surprisingly good. The safe can be accessed in about 3 seconds or less. The programming is well designed with warning indicators when the battery is low. It also supports multiple fingerprints per person, and multiple persons. And it tracks who accesses the safe. This is a well thought through design. Note, this safe is not a replacement for an RSC or UL grade safe. It is a great small safe for securing items when quick access is the priority.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Top notch biometric safe
customer_reviews.text: I am completely thrilled with the S6000 fingerprint safe. Has a built in light helps you see when the door is open. Gives you the option to secure it through the back or the bottom of the safe. The fingerprint reader is top notch, and it's really intuitive to set up. I also know from experience the company stands behind the product with a great customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: valkryderNhawaii

customer_reviews.title: Quickly scans & opens, every time!
customer_reviews.text: After extensive comparisons with other similar pistol vaults, I kept coming back to this model and simply waited until I wanted to part with the extra cash to get one. It opens fast, and is relatively quiet, though not dead silent. If I could recommend anything to the manufacturer, Verifi, is to build a similar model that has heavier gauge steel, and has some kind of fireproof rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: At one time I had a five star review on this safe and bought a total of four. And then they stopped working, fingerprint would not read. It read for awhile, then kapoey. Threw one in the trash today and if will most likely throw the others away and get a key punch electronic entry system. I bought a Sentry safe, about same size, so far it works great. As for people breaking into them, they are not for that purpose since anyone could pick it up and take it away. They are designed for keeping stuff safe around strangers, workers, etc., not for entire protection of your gems.
customer_reviews.author: Picartist

customer_reviews.title: Flawless operation so far
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly so far. Programmed in my wife and I, multiple fingers, they all work easily as long as I'm not getting it from odd angles (and then it usually works fine then). We did a little testing with fingers not programmed in and it correctly rejected them. Quick and relatively quiet to open.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I purchased a safe that I needed that was this size. Everything works absolutely perfectly. I've had it for at least a month now and everything is still operating PERFECTLY! The fingerprint reader works perfectly. I access this safe several times per day (amongst other things I keep medications in the safe) and the battery is at 97% even after over a month of usage while opening and closing the safe five or six times per day.
customer_reviews.author: Dave York Pa

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for me. I'm in my 40s and took about 6x to get a full read. My mom who is 70ish, took considerably more scans to get a read, we're talking over a dozen which got her frustrated. However, it did open for her first try. Kind of expensive, but I think you get what you pay for. Would be nice if there were a fire safe version, but that would be a stretch to get the same convenience. I like the way the backup key is concealed.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to say this is exactly what I was looking for. After reviewing many products I decided on the Verifi S6000 Smart Safe. So many others' reviews mentioned issues with the fingerprint scanners, but the Verifi S6000 works perfect every time. This is what you want when you need to access your firearm(s) quickly. If you need your weapon immediately for whatever reason, you need a quality safe that opens every time without delay. It has plenty of room and is secure. With an eight year old child in the home i feel certain this product will definitely keep any curiosity at bay.
customer_reviews.author: suitsa

customer_reviews.title: We Bought Two
customer_reviews.text: Bought one last year for the home and now just purchased a 2nd one for transporting firearms in our vehicles to meet California's ludicrous new laws, but we have the utmost confidence in this Safe. Zvetco Biometrics for the Verifi Smart Safe S6000 safe line. Matt & Debbie Redding California
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been happy with this so far - it appears to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been happy with this so far - it appears to be very well built with quality materials and craftsmanship. The finger scanner works perfectly every time and I have no concern that it won't open when/if needed in an emergency. The setup was extremely easy and straight forward, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Church

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was a little concerned about the fingerprint sensor being too sensitive, but have not had any problem with it opening on the first try. Well constructed, great place to secure anything of value easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great safe and phenomenal customer service
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal customer service and the safe has been exactly what we wanted and needed. There was an issue with our first safe and they shipped out a replacement immediately and followed up with us promptly. We'd highly recommend this safe to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fingerprint recognition!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is perfect for my needs. Quite compact, but will hold legal size paperwork. I have owned a few biometric safes and this one is by far the easiest (and in my opinion) most secure to program and use. Not secure enough to stop a true safe cracker, but without serious power tools (LOUD) or mad skills, no one is opening it.
customer_reviews.author: MjSoco

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick access when you need it or just ...
customer_reviews.text: For the true gun owner who values security. Easy and quick access when you need it or just when you need to grab your sidearm. No worry about anyone getting to your guns that shouldn't, like kids. Provides peace of mind and also a secure place for any weapons. I can now secure my weapons in my big safe and with this product anywhere else I want them if needed quickly by myself or my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of great quality and fairly intuitive for programming multiple prints
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of great quality and fairly intuitive for programming multiple prints. I am the only person in the house so I programmed it for holding my finger at different angles so that when I reach over from my bed, I don't have to worry about whether I'm holding my finger the same as when I programmed it.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Quick access and very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several safes and this one by far is the best. Finger print works every time. I’m in and out of it at lest 4 times a day. It’s the perfect size to fit in my closet cabinet just perfect. The best part is it’s small enough but large enough t fit a Kel-Tech sub 2000 it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bereal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints. The safe works great. I've issued three users, all of us have put at least four fingers onto our individual user ID's. I have my family and friends try to open it and they cannot. One thing that would be nice would be better lighting for inside the safe, the LEDs are on the door by the hinges, and when objects are in the right side it darkens the safe. I'm very pleased, love the battery indicator, and I am sure this was worth the extra money! Don't forget to put the keys somewhere, I left them in the packaging box and the wife threw them away!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Fast Access
customer_reviews.text: The safe works really well. It recognizes the fingerprints fast and opens fast. I've tested it several times and it distinguishes between good and bad fingerprints very well. If I needed to get into the safe in an emergency this is perfect and far safer/faster than pin code buttons. After researching other safes it is very evident that the technology used in this safe is far superior to these other cheaper more popular safes. My family is more than worth the extra $$$. I will update if I encounter any problems.
customer_reviews.author: T & L Adams

customer_reviews.title: This is it!  Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller safe which is much more clunky to get into. I am a person who has great reasons for needing this safe and I had done a good bit of research prior to purchasing. I am thrilled and I highly recommend this Fast Access Biometric Safe, regardless of what you need to lock up for safety, this will get you in and out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Becki Royce

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best safe out there
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best safe out there, did months of research. The fingerprint scanner is definitely the best flawless in its operation. Which is definitely what you want in a situation when you need quick access.
customer_reviews.author: R.Perry2017

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the unit for piece of mind. We have many grand children and want to protect them from accidentally getting a hold of our loaded weapons. This provides easy access for us in case of an emergency while protecting them. Very happy with this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Teeters

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program, a very accurate and quick finger-print reader, opens instantly and auto-locks when you close the door. Excellent for quick authorized access to anything that you want locked away, fire-arms, medications, valuables, etc. It's not a fire safe, but it can be bolted down and would take a fair amount of extreme damage using tools to open without the right finger-print(s) or the emergency key. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Could have been a 5
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Have not had a single issue. Would be a 5 but the light inside leaves a bit to be desired
customer_reviews.author: Taylor P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for quick home defense
customer_reviews.text: Reads everytime, multiple user profiles and audit log. Only complaint is manual unlock key hole apparently is easy to pick but this is to keep my kids safe with a single second open time. YouTube for example of lock picking. Unsure about resistance to prying but it's built pretty tough. I would store expensive and long guns in a real safe but this is great for instant access without a bunch of false reads.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great biometric safe.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had less than great results from biometric safes until now. The setup and menu system is better than I had imagined. The fingerprint reader is so much more accurate than any other I’ve used in the past. I could not ask for a better solution in this price and size range.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Solid safe, poor lining
customer_reviews.text: Great print recognition, solidly build, minus one star for no good internal soft lining - there is only a thing rubber/foam mesh on the bottom, all other sides are exposed metal. Watch out for scratching your valuables! I ended up purchasing foam for the entire interior, but I think this should come with it.
customer_reviews.author: ddr3

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love the safe, only thing is I wish the entry was a bit taller. The door jam has a lip around it that shrinks the size of the opening. That being said the safe is very nice. Been using it a few times a day for almost a month and the Batteries are still 100%. Just a suggestion for the people that complain about battery life, don’t use the batteries that come with the safe, get brand new Duracell or energizer batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR STORAGE OF FIREARMS AND OTHER ITEMS YOU WANT TO KEEP 100% SECURE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Verifi safe was a breeze to set up. It had great review and after getting the safe I DO ABSOLUTELY believe it was worth every penny. They say you get what you pay for and I believe that to be absolutely true with this safe. I bought this safe for easy access to store my firearm. Keeps me (as well as my family) safe and secure. Couldn’t be happier with my purchase LOVE THIS SAFE COULDN’T BE HAPPIER... NOT CHEAP BUT WORTH EVERY PENNY!!! Great for protection, easy programming (had it up and running in under 5 minutes), and above all else SECURE
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Love it....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little safe for my needs. Keeps guns and ammo nicely secured...and so far the fingerprint scanner has worked every time. Nice quality inside and out...and love that it has a light inside.
customer_reviews.author: Tanja

customer_reviews.title: This safe is awesome! Has e worked flawlessly for a year of ...
customer_reviews.text: This safe is awesome! Has e worked flawlessly for a year of daily use. I have an adventurous 5 year old, and having my pistols locked up is definitely a good feeling! Even after a year, the battery is still at 82%.
customer_reviews.author: HeSmellsLikeSmoke

customer_reviews.title: Verifi is Vericool...
customer_reviews.text: This safe is easy to use, and it does what the manufacturer says it will do. The fingerprint pad is fast, as well as intuitive when setting up fingerprint profiles. The long and short of it is, fingerprint scanners are better than number pads; you can't guess fingerprints, but you can guess numbers, eventually. I like it, a lot. You will too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Piddington

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic safe. Worth th investment
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic safe. Worth th investment. Opens first time every time. Batteries still have over 90 percent after one year of owning. Do not look any further for a quality safe. Only wish interior light would be brighter and stay on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically write reviews but this has been a great purchase. Setup is easy, scanner has been great, and I love the ability to see who has opened the safe or if there have been any unsuccessful attempts. I've owned this safe about 8 months now and battery is still at 92%. I just wish they would make a smaller flat version I could mount close to my door entrance to put my every day carry in as I enter the house.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Superb unit.
customer_reviews.text: Just superb. It's exactly what I'd been looking for. Well made and stylish. Wish they'd have done a quality rug line for the interior, but again, you have great security, the ability to mount/secure, and a fantastic fingerprint tech that has yet to fail or give me a false result. Can't recommend this more highly. Worth the added expense. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ken WTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic biometric safe
customer_reviews.text: I considered many different options for securing my handgun but ultimately wanted something that would offer the. Eat protection from young inquisitive children. This is built very well and works like a charm. I opted for the larger one and am glad I did. A great safe and opens every time - would highly recommend to anyone considering a biometric safe to go for this one!
customer_reviews.author: R. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Nice little safe
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that it didn't come with separators for my guns but it functions perfectly and is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ein

customer_reviews.title: believe the 5-star reviews
customer_reviews.text: This safe is easy to set up and easy to use. It has never failed to read a fingerprint. My wife and I have each stored our fingerprints under two different user IDs. Once the fingerprints are stored (easy to do), there is nothing extra to do to open the safe ... you just put your fingerprint on the sensor and the safe automatically recognizes the person opening the door. Believe the other 5-star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: modavis99

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this safe
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased. For me, it worth spending the extra money for this safe. What’s the point in getting a cheap safe if it’s not going to be study and protect your valuable. This easily holds three handguns, extra mags, credit cards, money clips, and jewelry. Keep in mind, this is not a fire safe but it is a study, accessible way to protect the things that you may need quick access to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, easy to program but be aware, only the person designated as an administer is able to make changes to the programming. I have, and would suggest that the administrator program more than one finger or one hand, you never know if one or the other would be disabled.
customer_reviews.author: LUIZ DIAZ JR

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Was glad to see that the fingerprint scanner worked correctly; our son wasn't able to open it and we were notified that someone unauthorized tried to open it.
customer_reviews.author: CML Branford CT

customer_reviews.title: This safe is perfect for securing my gun and allowing me to get ...
customer_reviews.text: This safe is perfect for securing my gun and allowing me to get to it quickly if needed. The set up is simple, as the step by step instructions on the screen guide you through it in minutes. I like that it logs every attempt to open so I can see if anyone, other than me, has tried to open it. It has enough room for multiple hand guns and ammunition.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Rice

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Have multi users programed to open! Easy to setup and batteries last a long time.. I have two units! looking to bu a third
customer_reviews.author: IP Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Really solid product and there is a reason it has high ratings the build quality is top notch and the biometric system is high end. I'm very impressed with my purchase and looked at a lot of options and although this safe is a little more cost it's well worth it considering why I needed a safe in the the first place. My advice pay a little more and buy this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: D Beals

customer_reviews.title: Real deal!
customer_reviews.text: It's the real deal. Works perfectly. Unlike the cheaper brands that open with anyone's finger. Trust me, this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Berger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, reliable biometric safe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent biometric safe - no false positives nor false negatives yet, which is atypical with most fingerprint technology. Also, failed attempts notification, access logs and open door alarm, as well as internal light make this a very well rounded safe, It's larger than we thought it'd be so better make sure it'll fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Technology and Safety at its Best
customer_reviews.text: Best fingerprint safe I have purchased. Picks up print easily and super fast. Love the smooth automatic locking upon closing. Never would consider an unlocked weapon in my home and feel this delays my access by 1-2 seconds (will take that any day over the chance of a kid, or criminal, finding my weapons).
customer_reviews.author: G. Porat

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Yes. I rarely write a review. Could not be better than expected. I put the override key in our safety deposit box at the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Harper

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I've had this over a year, no problems. Battery is still showing over 90%. I use it almost everyday. I have other family try and open it, it has held true to what was loaded into memory.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fast , quiet and reliable opening
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent home safe! I open and close this safe at least 3-4 times a day for the last 3 months and the finger print reader never fails. Fast, quiet and reliable 100% of the time. Well built construction of the safe itself. Perfect for nightstand draw or secured in a closet. I have no doubt that if I need to get my handgun while half asleep in the middle of the night this safe will not give me any troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to setup, fingerprint technology works great. Easy fits both of my handguns with plenty of room for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe all the reviews, this safe is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly even months later. Loved all the space for the price!
customer_reviews.author: HildigerR

customer_reviews.title: Great safe!
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, I've used it for several months now. It's never failed to read my prints and shows my name every time I open it. It's also alerted me several times when my kids tried to open it.
customer_reviews.author: M Howard

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe!
customer_reviews.text: Safe is very well built and the biometrics are fantastic. Will be able to put around 3 handguns in safe and a few other valuables. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product now for several months. The safe has sore to flawlessly and the batteries are lasting a very long time. I would recommend this safe to anyone looking for a quality safe.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jablonkay

customer_reviews.title: Opens EVERY single  time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Super easy to setup with very clear on screen instruction. I have owned for about 5 months now and with daily use, I have not had one single issue with opening from my fingerprint. Still at 90% battery power too. You will not be disappointed with this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lar256

customer_reviews.title: The safe was a sound purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The biometric access panel was easy to set up and use. The safe is sturdy and well constructed. The safe can be attached to a shelf or piece of furniture to reduce the possibility of someone removing it. It also has a small light to help see inside the safe. I am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: ++++AAAAA Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting to dislike or like something as mundane as a safe, but darned if this isn't a bit fun. Easy set up, roomy enough for my needs, and seems really sturdy. I highly recommend if you're on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Te finger print sensor is very fast and access is quick and easy. The unit did come scratched so that's why I docked them a star. I didn't wanna go through the hassle of a return
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to set up and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I contemplated for a long time over which gun safe to get, to keep my firearm away from my children. This is easy to set up and works like a charm. I'm happy I spent a little more to get a safe that is secure and opens quickly and reliably. I've opened it several times in the month that I've owned it and it always opens on the first try. Also set up my wife's prints and she likes how it works also.
customer_reviews.author: NewDadKC

customer_reviews.title: High quality, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: If not for the finger print sensor my wife would never use a safe. This one has really worked out well. It’s high quality and comes with the lag bolts to attach it to your wall or floor.
customer_reviews.author: uncas

customer_reviews.title: The fingerprint feature is great!
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint feature makes this safe so much easier to use and faster to open than other safes we've used previously. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: artist&gardener

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best product that I ever bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best product that I ever bought on Amazon, high quality, quick delivery, easy instructions, everything works with no issues, and best of all, the safe opens in a few seconds which is exactly what I need in an emergency. Simply the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: thulium

customer_reviews.title: Reads fingerprint every time
customer_reviews.text: Best fingerprint scanner on the market. I’ve had it for months now. Use it almost every day. Not once has it failed to read my fingerprint. I wish they made larger, fireproof gun safes. I would definitely buy one for my long guns.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDoe

customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but they very happy with this , would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, with zero fails reading my fingerprint. Nice light inside. Could be higher profile to enable easier removal of firearms. Could also be less expensive for what it is. Happy with it overall though.
customer_reviews.author: PatrickH_11

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for a year and it works great. I have put various fingers into the system ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a year and it works great. I have put various fingers into the system and it never fails to work with my finger prints.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best safe I've come across. Fool proof and very secure.
customer_reviews.author: M_Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Guns Secured
customer_reviews.text: I love this gun safe. Easy to set up and use. Print reader does an awesome job. No worries about grand kids getting into.
customer_reviews.author: A Center

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The finger identification does not always work on the first swipe but it always works by the 2nd or third read. It's never failed to open and it's easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Munck

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great, only wish maybe a little taller
customer_reviews.author: Big John

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint reader works perfectly every time. My only suggestion would be to make a version that is a bit thicker walled.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but well made.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but extremely easy to use. Heavy duty, well made, and the print reader is worth the extra expense
customer_reviews.author: Schrecht

product_meta.title: Verifi Smart.Safe. Biometric Gun Safe with FBI Certified Fingerprint Sensor, LED Light, Self-Diagnostics, Tamper Alerts and AutoLock
feature_bullets: LARGEST and ONLY FBI CERTIFIED FINGERPRINT SENSOR in any gun safe captures high-resolution fingerprint images to enhance recognition for QUICK ACCESS
SELF-DIAGNOSTICS are performed on the electronics and batteries to ensure they're ready for use in the moments you may need them the most
YEARS OF OPERATION on a single set of batteries (included)
TAMPER ALERTS are timestamped and logged to keep you informed of unauthorized access attempts, backup-key access and reset attempts
LED Adjustable Light, AUTO-LOCK, backup-key access, wall/floor mountable, stores 40 fingerprints, easy user management, solid steel construction, FSD approved, engineered in the USA

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
